words.source: H3318 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of יָצָא 'to go out'; KJV 'went out', ESV 'went out', NASB 'went out'

H5973 prep. min + prep. ʿim 'from with'; KJV 'from', ESV 'from', NASB 'from'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H5892 art. + n.fs ʿir 'city'; KJV 'the city', ESV 'the city', NASB 'the city'

H3709 n.fd constr. kaph 'palm, hand' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'his hands', ESV 'his hands', NASB 'his hands'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H2308 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of חָדַל 'to cease, stop'; KJV 'and the thunders … ceased', ESV 'then the thunder … ceased', NASB 'and the thunder … ceased'
H6963 art. + n.mp qolot 'voices, thunders'; KJV 'the thunders', ESV 'the thunder', NASB 'the thunder'
H1259 waw + art. + n.ms barad 'hail'; KJV 'and hail', ESV 'and the hail', NASB 'and the hail'
H4306 waw + n.ms matar 'rain'; KJV 'and the rain', ESV 'and the rain', NASB 'and rain'
